column2:
"A customer mentioned it.
They said that the Darker known
as Crabarda has a super hard carapace!"

"If I process it well,
I think I can use it as a mortar!"

"I'll be waiting with bated breath.
I'm counting on you!"

"お客さんが言ってたの。
クラバーダってダーカーの
甲殻が超堅い、って！"

"うまく加工すれば
すり鉢に使えると思うの！"

"今度も期待して待ってるわ。
よろしくお願いね！"
